entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
